Source.Name: iniparser
Source.Description: iniParser is a simple C library offering ini file parsing services. The library is pretty small (less than 1500 lines of C) and robust, and does not depend on any other external library to compile. It is written in C and should compile on most platforms without difficulty.

Package.Name: iniparser
Package.Description: iniParser is a simple C library offering ini file parsing services. The library is pretty small (less than 1500 lines of C) and robust, and does not depend on any other external library to compile. It is written in C and should compile on most platforms without difficulty.
